ee, eeye araliyagaha mandiraye pawathi mathiwarana komishan sabhawe upaya margika salasum pilibanda sakachchawakata ekwemin.mema hamuwata ekwemin adahas dakwu mathiwarana komishan sabhawe sabhapathi mahinda deshapriya sandahan kara aththe mathiwarana nithiwala sanshodhanayak athyawashya bawatayi.mathiwaranayata adala apa mudal sanshodhanaya kirima, mathiwaranaya pawathwena dinaye chandaya prakasha kirimata nohaki pudgalayin wenuwen eeta pera wenama dinayak labadima, wayasa awurudu 18 sampurna wu wigasa chanda ayithiya labena se chanda himi namalekhana masa 03 kata wathawak yawathkalina kirima, wideshagatha shri lankikayinta chanda ayithiya labadima ehidi mathiwarana komisame niladharin wisin agramathyawarayata penwa di athi sidukala yuthu sanshodhana athara wanawa.

wage therumak gena dena kathawak.man me hadanne mata mage sahakariyata denna puluwan dewal gana layisthuwak hadannayi.udema anda langata the koppayak genihin denna puluwanoonnan pan kallaka majarin saha jam gala dennath puluwanindala hitala dawasaka kots blawus ekak onnan madala denna puluwandawalta kanna geniyanna pan pethi dekak maddata elolu, malu hadapu eewa thiyena widiyata dala denna puluwanindala hitala dawasaka kanna mas, bonchi, parippu wage dewal sarala widiyata uyala denna puluwankawiyak liyala, eeka sinduwak widiyata gayana karanna uthsaha karanna puluwanhadisiye man maloth hema mawa mathakwenna kiyala ara gost film eke wage mewwa ekak thaggakata aran denna puluwanigenime katayuthuwalata awawadathmaka udaw denna puluwanbankuwalin naya ganima gana padam kiyala denna puluwannayata dime aadinawa gana kiyala denna puluwanonnan me layisthuwa thawa chuttak withara dikkaranna puluwanhabayi ithin hama ekakama simawakuth thiyenawa!dan man me wisthara liyanne ayida kiyala aayeth kiyanawa nan, api anungen balaporoththuwena dewal gana layisthu hadanawata wada apita ape sahakarayata ho sahakariyata denna puluwan dewal gana kiyana eka wadagath bawa pennannayi.dan menna ada kathandare.

ee budu dahama pilibanda mishanarin ge saba muhunuwara helidaraw karamini.eheth bauddhagama udesa ewani awasanawantha thaththwayak athi kirimata merata bauddha nayakayin ida thabuwe natha.budu dahamata nisi thana laba nodemin siya aagam merata wyaptha karawimata thath daru wideshiyayan ge uthsahaya wyartha karamin 19 wani siyawasa agabhagaya wana wita bauddha punarjiwana wyaparaya diwayina purama wyaptha wiya.ee mishanari wyapthiwadinta srujuwama abhiyoga ella karamini.
badu saha yuddhayata erehi pariwarthaniya balawegayan wana sanwadaya saha sahayogithawaya sandaha kriyakari nawothpadanaya prawardhanaya karanna.
